alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 18 at 1:55AM MST until November 18 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow ongoing. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. * WHERE...The Southern Front Range Foothills, Denver, Castle Rock, and Byers. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slick and hazardous road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.
